00050     template< class CharT, class Traits=std::char_traits<CharT>,
00051              class Alloc=std::allocator<CharT> >
00052     class BasicSymbol :public ostreamable, public istreamable, 
00053                      public Hashable {
00054     public:
00056       typedef std::basic_string<CharT, Traits, Alloc> str_type;
00057       
00058     private:
00070       typedef typename 
00071         boost::flyweight< str_type,
00072                        boost::flyweights::no_tracking,
00073                        boost::flyweights::intermodule_holder > ref_type;
00074 
00075     public:
00082       BasicSymbol(str_type const &str = str_type()) 
00083        :m_name(create(str)) {}
00094       BasicSymbol(CharT const *str, size_t len =str_type::npos)
00095        :m_name(create(str, len)) {}
00102       BasicSymbol(BasicSymbol const &other)
00103        :m_name(other.m_name) {}
00105       ~BasicSymbol() {
00106       }
00107 
00116       BasicSymbol &operator= (BasicSymbol const &other) {
00117        m_name = other.m_name;
00118        return *this;
00119       }
00120 
00131       BasicSymbol &reset(CharT const *str=NULL, size_t len=str_type::npos) {
00132        m_name = create(str, len);
00133        return *this;
00134       }
00135       
00143       bool empty() const {
00144        return m_name.get().empty();
00145       }
00150       size_t length() const {
00151        return size_t(empty()?0:m_name->size());
00152       }
00153       
00167       bool operator==(BasicSymbol const &other) const {
00168        return m_name==other.m_name;
00169       }
00183       bool operator!=(BasicSymbol const &other) const {
00184        return !operator==(other);
00185       }
00197       bool operator< (BasicSymbol const &other) const;
00209       bool operator> (BasicSymbol const &other) const {
00210        return other.operator< (*this);
00211       }
00223       bool operator<=(BasicSymbol const &other) const {
00224        return !operator> (other);
00225       }
00237       bool operator>=(BasicSymbol const &other) const {
00238        return !operator< (other);
00239       }
00240 
00245       str_type const &str() const {
00246        return m_name.get();
00247       }
00248 
00249     private:
00251       ref_type m_name;
00261       static ref_type create(str_type const &str);
00272       static ref_type create(CharT const *str, size_t len);
00273 
00274       std::ostream &print_to(std::ostream &out) const;
00275       std::istream &read_from(std::istream &in);
00276       size_t hash() const;
00277 
00278     }; // TREX::utils::BasicSymbol<>

00292     typedef BasicSymbol<char> Symbol;
00293 
00294     
00305     template<>
00306     inline Symbol string_cast<Symbol>(std::string const &in,
00307                                   std::ios_base &(*format)(std::ios_base &)) {
00308       return Symbol(in);
